amendment.description: To require a report on the feasibility of omitting Social Security numbers from military identification cards.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4336 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4336 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6386) To require a report on the feasibility of omitting Social Security numbers from military identification cards.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4336 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4336 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Hutchison.
